about_the_game:
Nightmare Materials is a Pixel-Art Metroidvania with Combat, Puzzles
and a lot of exploration and discovering.

As a Drone you explore a lost and mysterious World, in need for answers and
to discover the dark secrets of this World and find the truth about your mission
and the darkness of this planet.

Nightmare Materials is a challenging Game, with a lot of ways to die.
You may encounter a lot of differen foes: some will be easy and others verry strong.
NM has a lot of enemy variety and a lot of differen Biomes and Bosses.

The game features a weapon and accessory system, complimenting each other with
a change in the player stats. This being damage, health, attackspeed, movement and others.
The weapon system allows the player to weild different categorys of medival, range and
melee weapons, with various damage types and combo potential. Planing your weapon
and accessory lineup, allows the player to develop his own fighting style.

The game has a main story with a lot of side activitys like puzzles and challanges,
side quests, NPCs and Achivements.
The diffrent biomes and surroundings, with their own enemys and bosses corelating
and mixing it with your own expandable and adjustable playstyle, makes the game an forever lasting experience
